attributes.action: Allow People 16/17 to be able to vote in the referendum and future ones
attributes.background: The recent referendum was a example as in why 16 and 17 year olds should be able to vote , if those above the age d 65+ could vote im sure that those that are 16 and 17 should also be able to vote. At the ages of 16/17, they are the next generation and should be able to vote on their future
